CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( $Label.Pacific_Timezone, TEXT(BillingStateCode)),"Pacific", IF(CONTAINS( $Label.Mountain_Timezone , TEXT(BillingStateCode)),"Mountain", IF(CONTAINS( $Label.Central_Timezone,TEXT(BillingStateCode)),"Central", IF(CONTAINS( $Label.Eastern_Timezone,TEXT(BillingStateCode)),"Eastern", IF(ISPICKVAL(BillingStateCode,"AK"),"Alaskan", IF(ISPICKVAL(BillingStateCode,"HI"),"Hawaiian", null))))))
CustomField.label: Timezone
